lead_paragraph: Two decades after the NFL brushed off concussion concerns as being of interest only to journalists, the issue is at the forefront of any discussion about player safety and unlikely to go away anytime soon.

headline.print_headline: Concussions Remain Common Even as Awareness Improves
headline.main: Concussions Remain Common Even as Awareness Improves
